courses.name: Symmetry and Geometry
courses.description: Course about symmetry groups and tilings using Conwayâ€™s approach with orbifolds instead of going deep into group theory

courses.name: Computing and Numerics
courses.description: Introductory Python course applied to numerical methods (such as integral estimates) alongside teaching good coding practices.

courses.name: Python Programming
courses.description: Introductory Python course touching on coding practices and applications around data analysis (numpy/scipy/pandas...). Concluding in open-ended group project analysing open datasets.

courses.name: Honours Analysis Skills
courses.description: Presentation skills workshop with topics around real analysis

courses.name: Facets of Mathematics
courses.description: Course driven by 3 project-oriented topics making use of a variety of mathematical related soft skills including latex typesetting, poster making & presentation, and numeric & symbolic computing. Mathematical theory involved in course included statistics, finite difference methods, and projective geometry.

courses.name: Maths Base
courses.description: Drop in session for students to ask for help in any of their courses
